Package game.grounds.spawners

Class EmptyHutBoss

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Ground
game.grounds.spawners.Spawners
game.grounds.spawners.EmptyHut
game.grounds.spawners.EmptyHutBoss
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, CanSpawn
public class EmptyHutBoss extends EmptyHut
The EmptyHutBoss class represents a special type of empty hut terrain called "Empty Hut Boss" in the game world. Empty Hut Bosses can spawn certain types of monsters and have their spawn chance adjusted based on weather conditions. The EmptyHutBoss class extends the EmptyHut class and overrides the tick method to adapt its spawn chance to sunny weather.

  • Constructor Details

    • EmptyHutBoss

      public EmptyHutBoss(CanClone monster, int spawnChance, Weather weather)
      Constructor for the EmptyHutBoss class. Initializes an empty hut boss terrain that can spawn a specific type of monster and adjusts its spawn chance based on weather.
      Parameters:
      monster - The prototype of the monster that can spawn in empty hut bosses.
      weather - The weather object representing the current weather conditions in the game.

  • Method Details

    • tick

      public void tick(Location location)
      Overrides the tick method to adapt the spawn chance of the Empty Hut Boss based on weather conditions. During sunny weather, the spawn chance is increased by 2 times the default spawn chance. Otherwise, the spawn chance is reverted to its default value.
      Overrides:
      tick in class Spawners
      Parameters:
      location - The location where the tick operation is performed.
